name: Ceremony of Aeon's Shield
summary: Your patron aeon graced you with powers of protection.
description:
Your patron aeon graced you with powers of protection. You can cast resist energy and shield other each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Conrasu: A people that are made of cosmic force given consciousness and housed within unique exoskeletons. Conrasus craft and use these weapons.
